page.title: 05BADDESLEY CLINTON:MR.OTTON
page.content: { {Mr Otton's day}begins at 6.00am. He puts the kettle on, lets his dogs out &{gardens}for about 2 hours. Then for {breakfast}he has cornflakes & toast. Until lunchtime he does odd jobs such as chopping up wood for his fire & sweeping the yard. At noon, for{lunch,}he has a snack e.g. sandwiches. During the afternoon Mr Otton reads the{paper}& watches the {television.}His favourites are sport, English soap operas (Coronation Street, Emmerdale Farm) , Westerns & the News at 5.45 pm. He has his{tea}at 5.30, his main meal of the day. In the evening he sometimes goes to the pub for a game of{dominoes,}or watches television. He normally goes to{bed}at 10.00 p.m. The only{luxuries}he treats himself to are a pint of bitter and tobacco.
